Title: S9:E5 - Why you should understand user interface and design (Mina Markham)
Description: No matter how good of an idea you have for a product, if the design isn't executed well and people don't like the interface, the product might as well not even exist. To talk about the importance of good user interfaces and design, we brought in Mina Markham, senior engineer at Slack and creator of the Pantsuit User Interface for Hilary Clinton's 2016 campaign  Show Links Partner with Dev & CodeNewbie!
